com.namics.oss.java.tools.utils.excel

Class ExcelBeanReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.namics.oss.java.tools.utils.excel.ExcelBeanReader

  • public class ExcelBeanReader
extends Object
    Reader to read Beans form excel. Therefor the header row is parsed for property names and matched to fields of bean class. Each row is mapped to a specific bean by setting properties. For now this works for String values only.
    Since:
    08.09.14 16:17
    Author:
    aschaefer, Namics AG

    • Method Detail

      • read

        public <T> List<T> read(Class<T> clazz,
                        InputStream input,
                        Map<String,String> mapping)
                 throws ExcelException
        Read the excel file and map rows to beans of type T
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type od beans returned (determined by clazz)
        Parameters:
        clazz - class of the Beans to return (T)
        input - input stream of the excel to read
        mapping - map for mapping. key=header value, value=name of property descriptor
        Returns:
        List of beans read form excel
        Throws:
        ExcelException - runtime exception when excel processing failed

      • read

      • parseHeaderRow

        protected <T> Map<Integer,Method> parseHeaderRow(org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Sheet sheet,
                                                 Class<T> clazz,
                                                 Map<String,String> mapping)
                                          throws Exception
        Method parses the header row of the sheet to extract the properties.
        Parameters:
        sheet - the Excel sheet to process
        Returns:
        a Map with column number to bean properties field mapping.
        Throws:
        Exception
